trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Leesville
There were no other sightings in Leesville on or around April 15th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting outside an a big ball of green light flying real fast an then just all of a sudden it just went I told my friends if yall would of seen just seen I sware that mom wouldnt wake up on my knees I sware I just a big ball of green light I feel like stupid telling people about always seeing mysterious lights in my life down this same road I have reported to yall before. What I saw tonight I have never seen something so out of the ordinary in my life someone really needs to do some investigation in this area its making scared an I know Im not crazy after i seen the ball of green light one of my friends came a different side of town I just asked him if he saw something in the air he said I thought I was crazy looking at a ball of green light flying in the sky, an it was glowing flying kinda fast but I saw it go down man this is like seeing the most scaryest thing I ever seen in my life.this is an ongoing sightings an no one seems to think this is really occuring here but it really needs to be checked out you probably find a little infomation this is really not a joke
Summary: a big ball of green light
